title: Cap Crown, ca. 1820
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Central stem with one large rosette-like blossom, seven tiny rosette-like blossoms and five leaves. Eyelets powdered over ground. Drawstring in casing at lower edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Crown, ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Technique: needlework on net. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-96.
